items.title: JULGI coordinates vascular development and leaf patterning through non-cell-autonomous regulation of miR165/166
items.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 10 January 2026; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-67339-7 Leaf and vein development must be precisely coordinated, yet the molecular signals linking these processes have remained unclear. items.title: Alleviating non-radiative losses in organic solar cells through side-chain regulation of low-bandgap non-fullerene acceptors
